Text: Could you _please_ release this as DVD9?
Yes, please release this in dvd9 instead of DIVX.. Not all of our Back to the Future fan's have a DIVX compatible dvd-player.. And the DIVX-format is not a first-class choise..

Thank you. :-)
But I to would like to se DVD9.

thank you for your interest. i am currently seeing what responce i will get from this version and then will possibly make the dvd9 requested.
